content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine at position(-18.5, 19.5) 
- Boiler at position(-13.5, 20.0) 
- Offshore pump at position(-11.5, 26.5) 
- Small electric poles at positions(-16.5, 19.5) and (-19.5, 22.5)

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)

### Pipe network
Consists of the following entities:
- Multiple pipe groups connecting various points, including positions such as (-18.5, 16.5), (-12.5, 21.5), and (-11.5, 20.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to power connections
- Ensure that all electricity generators, such as steam engines and boilers, are properly connected to a power network to avoid 'not connected to power network' warnings. 

### Errors when using fluid connections
- Ensure that the boiler has fuel available to prevent 'out of fuel' warnings. 
- Verify that the offshore pump is connected to a water source and is functioning properly to avoid 'no input liquid' warnings.

### Errors when crafting
- Ensure you have the required items available in your inventory before attempting to craft new entities, such as assembling machines, to avoid crafting failures. 

### Errors when placing entities
- Make sure to check that the area where you intend to place new entities is clear and not occupied by other structures to avoid placement errors.
